name: Quick Tour
description: Get a comprehensive overview of D-Day and the Normandy Campaign in just a couple of hours. Perfect for building foundational knowledge before diving deeper.

name: Deep Dive
description: A thorough exploration of every aspect of Operation Overlord, from strategic planning through to the liberation of Paris. Ideal for serious students of history.

name: French Perspective Track
description: Experience D-Day through French eyes. Focus on civilian experiences, the Resistance, and the profound impact of liberation on Normandy communities.

name: Commanders & Decisions Track
description: Study the key decision-makers on both sides. Analyze the strategic and tactical choices that shaped the outcome of the Normandy Campaign.
